name: Jacky Trigger
description:
Jacky Trigger- Aim & Shooting Game
App Subtitle
Aim & Shooting Game
App Description
This is a Fantastic FPS Casual Action Game, bringing you a refreshing shooting experience! Go and start your adventure, move forward and plan your strategy get massive skills! Explore more challenging chapters, blast through levels to get amazing weapons and unique outfits! How far you can go in these challenging places! Try it out!

FEATURES
Simple operation
Start with only one finger, hold to shoot, release to dodge
Lots of offline rewards and gifts

Excellent shooting experience
Various challenging locations
Different varieties of enemies
Unique and novel types of boss at each chapter
Free to upgrade your equipment after level-upgrading
More harder chapters are waiting to unlock

Creative random systems
Roguelike elements
Hundreds of talents help you achieve your mission

Cool weapons and awesome equipments
Real shooting experience
Enjoyable bullet hell and explosions
Hundreds of diverse weapons, like gatling, bazooka etc.

Unique outfits
A variety of unique skins
Strengthen your talents to become outstanding snipers!
